article.title: Status and history for [qxa]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: The language of this translation is in fact “Quechua, South Bolivian”, ISO 639-3 quh, BCP 47 quh. Thanks to Philip Jacobs for reporting this error.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
